abstract: Robert Keach, court-appointed trustee for settlement fund for victims 2013 train derailment that killed 47 people in Lac-Megantic, Quebec, says request to judge for extension until September 2015 to sort out detail about fund is first step; hopes proposed $200 million fund will eventually be worth $500 million, dependent on whether several corporations participate.
lead_paragraph: Parties involved in a proposed $200 million settlement fund for victims of a 2013 train disaster in Quebec asked a judge to give them until September to iron out the details.
snippet: Parties involved in a proposed $200 million settlement fund for victims of a 2013 train disaster in Quebec asked a judge to give them until September to iron out the details.

headline.main: Draft Settlement in Place for Victims of Derailment
headline.print_headline: Draft Settlement in Place for Victims of Derailment
